Description: Vase. Made of lustre (olive-green) glazed pottery over an opaque white glaze with a stylised vine-scroll motif and other curvilinear patterns.
Bibliographic references: Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.109, fig.2)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: 1970,1104.1 (marked on object and display label)
